source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT eh.RetryNumber as Retry 
FROM [dbo].[ExecutionConfiguration] ec
INNER JOIN [dbo].[ExecutionHistory] eh ON ec.id = eh.ExecutionConfigurationId
WHERE ec.ToBeExecuted = 1

ifTrueActivities.name: Stored procedure create Execution Live Plan

dependsOn.activity: Stored procedure create Execution Live Plan
